subject: Volvo Ocean Race
Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: The lone entry from the United States, Puma Ocean Racing, finished second in the 10-leg, around-the-world race, which finished in St. Petersburg, Russia.
snippet: The lone entry from the United States, Puma Ocean Racing, finished second in the 10-leg, around-the-world race, which finished in St. Petersburg, Russia.
